name: Seen
storyline: Submission for Halloween game jam and created in only two weeks. You have been bitten by a vampire who puts you into a "saw-like" trial where you must prove worthy of the dark gift he has given you or be destroyed. This is a short game (10 minute maximum, your time is ticking) with two characters to select from, and two endings based on your choices.
